tool_description: Connects to weather stations and retrieves real-time and historical atmospheric measurements including wind speed, direction, temperature, pressure, and humidity.

station_ids.description: List of weather station identifiers to query

start_time.description: Start datetime for data retrieval in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: End datetime for data retrieval in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid station ID: One or more station IDs are not recognized or accessible. Verify station identifiers are correct and active.
Time range error: End time must be after start time, and future dates are not allowed for historical data.
Data frequency not supported: Use one of [1min, 5min, 10min, 15min, 30min, 1hour].
Connection timeout: Unable to connect to weather station network. Check network connectivity and try again.
Station offline: One or more requested stations are currently offline or not reporting data.
usage: Provide valid station IDs and time range to retrieve weather measurements. Use appropriate data frequency based on forecasting needs - higher frequency for short-term predictions.

timestamps.description: ISO 8601 formatted timestamps for each measurement

station_data.description: Weather measurements formatted as comma-separated values for each timestamp

data_quality_flags.description: Quality assessment flags for each measurement indicating reliability

retrieved_count.description: Total number of data points successfully retrieved
